### 介绍
作者：周红梅

Luck game

### 代码
```{r}
luck <- function(x) {
  # select a number between 1 and 100
  s <- sample(1:100, 1)
  if (x > s)
    "drink whole wine"
  else if (x < s)
    "drink one half"
  else
    "luck"
  }
```

### 演示
```{r}
luck(55)
luck(1)
luck(99)
```
